GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.35
GSD.description:
ovl: fix leaked dentry

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.35 by commit 71d58457a8afc650da5d3292a7f7029317654d95, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 6815f479ca90ee7fd2e28b2a420f796b974155fe. For more details please see the references link.
